constituent: discuss, say, words, keitai, mouth, inflammation, fire, fire2
heisigStory: In almost every attempt to discuss an issue, the fervor of one's convictions comes to the surface and creates an inflammation of words (if you will, the "cuss" in discuss).
koohiiStory1: Think of an online discussion group where misunderstanding someone´s words leads to flaming. An angry discussion = inflamed words.
koohiiStory2: Internet discussions often involve inflammatory words. Flame war!
myStory: thảo luận. những lời nói thảo luận về viêm nhiễm
words:
縁談(えんだん): marriage proposal, engagement
会談(かいだん): conversation, conference, discussion, interview
座談会(ざだんかい): symposium, round-table discussion
雑談(ざつだん): chatting, idle talk
相談(そうだん): consultation, discussion
対談(たいだん): talk, dialogue, conversation
冗談(じょうだん): jest, joke
